All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessDeniedException
Custom exception to be thrown when a user attempts to access a resource or perform an action for which they do not have the necessary permissions.
Admin
The Admin class represents an administrator user in the FlipFit system.
AdminDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing Admin-level operations in the FlipFit application.
adminInterface
The AdminInterface defines the contract for all administrative operations.
AdminService
The AdminService class provides the business logic for all administrative tasks.
App
 
AuthenticationException
Custom exception to be thrown when a user's authentication credentials (e.g., username, password) are invalid or incorrect.
authenticationInterface
The AuthenticationInterface defines the contract for all authentication and registration operations.
AuthenticationService
The AuthenticationService class handles all user authentication and registration processes for customers and gym owners.
Booking
The Booking class represents a single booking made by a customer for a gym slot.
Customer
The Customer class represents a customer user in the FlipFit system.
CustomerDAO
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing customer-related operations in the FlipFit application.
customerInterface
The CustomerInterface defines the contract for all customer-related operations.
CustomerService
The CustomerService class provides the business logic for customer-related operations.
DAOException
Custom exception to be thrown for all database-related errors in the DAO layer.
DBConnection
 
DuplicateEntryException
Custom exception to be thrown when an attempt is made to create a duplicate entry.
GymCentre
The GymCentre class represents a gym center managed by a gym owner in the FlipFit application.
GymFlipFitAdminRestController
 
GymFlipFitCustomerRestController
REST controller for customer-related operations.
GymFlipFitGymOwnerRestController
REST controller for gym owner-related operations.
GymFlipFitUserRestController
 
GymOwner
The GymOwner class represents a gym owner user in the FlipFit system.
GymOwnerDAO
The GymOwnerDAO class provides **Data Access Object (DAO)** functionality for managing **GymOwner** and their associated **GymCentre** entities in the FlipFit system.
gymOwnerInterface
The GymOwnerInterface defines the contract for all gym owner-related operations.
GymOwnerService
The GymOwnerService class provides the business logic for all operations a gym owner can perform.
IndexOutOfBoundsException
Custom exception to be thrown when an index is out of bounds.
MismatchinputException
Thrown when user input does not conform to the expected format or type.
MissingValueException
Thrown when an expected value is null or missing.
Notification
Represents a notification sent to a user within the FlipFit application.
Payment
The Payment class represents a payment transaction in the FlipFit system.
Role
The Role class represents the role of a user within the FlipFit system.
Slot
The Slot class represents a specific time slot available at a gym for booking.
UnableToDeleteUserException
Thrown when an attempt to delete a user and its related data fails.
User
The User class represents a user within the FlipFit system.
UserDAO
The UserDAO class provides data access operations for the User entity.
Waitlist
The Waitlist class represents a customer's request to be placed on a waitlist for a fully booked gym slot.
